#export-btn-header.title: Create a password-protected backup of all your transactions. Your data is encrypted and never leaves your device.

label[for=\"import-file-header\"].title: Restore your transactions from an encrypted backup file. Enter the password you used when exporting.

label[for=\"income\"].title: Money coming in - salary, freelance, investments, etc.

label[for=\"expense\"].title: Money going out - food, rent, shopping, bills, etc.

#description.title: Brief description of the transaction (e.g., "Grocery shopping", "Salary payment")

#amount.title: Enter the amount in dollars (e.g., 50.25). Don't include the $ symbol.

#category.title: Choose a category to help organize and analyze your spending patterns

#tags.title: Add tags separated by commas for better organization (e.g., "work, travel, reimbursable")

button[type=\"submit\"].title: Save this transaction to your budget

#cancel-edit.title: Cancel editing and clear the form

label[for=\"overview-chart\"].title: Shows total income vs expenses overview

label[for=\"category-chart\"].title: Breaks down expenses by category to see where you spend most

label[for=\"all-transactions\"].title: Show all transactions - both income and expenses

#download-btn.title: Download a PDF summary report of your income, expenses, and balance
